channel.title: Eny one know the coords for here?
channel.description: I've been looking for this coords for abit now and im just wondering if eny one on here would know it. But it aint off my server and it aint got the coords on the server so I cant see it. Pease help ;D [img]http://www.freewebs.com/1sp3cpkz/corzzscape.bmp[/img]

item.title: Eny one know the coords for here?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

If you’re using the mopar client, type ::coordson … some other clients might have it. That’ll bring up thing on the screen that shows the coords you are on. To disable: ::coordsoff

or what the last two said, the one I mentioned is client sided and auto changes when you move.

Read full topic
item.source: Eny one know the coords for here?

item.title: Eny one know the coords for here?
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

yes, do ::mypos or if you dont have it add:

        else if (command.startsWith("mypos")){
		sendMessage("You are standing on X="+absX+" Y="+absY);
	}

Read full topic
item.source: Eny one know the coords for here?
